# supplementalMenu

**Instance Property**

A supplemental menu to augment the attribution view’s existing menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var supplementalMenu: NSMenuItem? { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var supplementalMenu: UIMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use `supplementalMenu` when there are additional actions a user can take on content represented by this view’s [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWHighlight]. A `nil` value informs the system to not add a supplemental menu.

## Customizing highlights

- **backgroundStyle**: The background style of the child view that contains names and avatars.
- **displayContext**: The context for the content the system displays with this view.
- **highlight**: The highlight you use to display this attribution.
- **highlightMenu**: A menu with a list of system actions specific to this hightlight.
- **horizontalAlignment**: The horizontal alignment of the view.
- **menuTitleForHideAction**: A localized string the system uses as a custom title for the hide menu item.
- **preferredMaxLayoutWidth**: A width the system uses to constrain the view contents.
